briefdescription.para: Get the number of attributes.

detaileddescription.para: The number is 8 before any dehardcoding is done in OpenMW.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of skills.

detaileddescription.para: The number is 27 before any dehardcoding is done in OpenMW.

briefdescription.para: Get the numerical ID of an attribute with a certain name.

detaileddescription.para: If an invalid name is used, the ID returned is -1

briefdescription.para: Get the numerical ID of a skill with a certain name.

detaileddescription.para: If an invalid name is used, the ID returned is -1

briefdescription.para: Get the name of the attribute with a certain numerical ID.

detaileddescription.para: If an invalid ID is used, "invalid" is returned.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of the skill with a certain numerical ID.

detaileddescription.para: If an invalid ID is used, "invalid" is returned.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of a player.
Get the race of a player.
Get the head mesh used by a player.

simplesect.para: The head mesh of the player.

briefdescription.para: Get the hairstyle mesh used by a player.

simplesect.para: The hairstyle mesh of the player.

briefdescription.para: Check whether a player is male or not.
Get the birthsign of a player.
Get the character level of a player.
Get the player's progress to their next character level.
Get the base health of the player.
Get the current health of the player.
Get the base magicka of the player.
Get the current magicka of the player.
Get the base fatigue of the player.
Get the current fatigue of the player.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short attributeId) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetAttributeBase

briefdescription.para: Get the base value of a player's attribute.

simplesect.para: The base value of the attribute.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short attributeId) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetAttributeModifier

briefdescription.para: Get the modifier value of a player's attribute.

simplesect.para: The modifier value of the attribute.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short skillId) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetSkillBase

briefdescription.para: Get the base value of a player's skill.

simplesect.para: The base value of the skill.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short skillId) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetSkillModifier

briefdescription.para: Get the modifier value of a player's skill.

simplesect.para: The modifier value of the skill.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short skillId) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetSkillProgress

briefdescription.para: Get the progress the player has made towards increasing a certain skill by 1.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned int attributeId) noexcept
memberdef.name: GetSkillIncrease

briefdescription.para: Get the bonus applied to a certain attribute at the next level up as a result of associated skill increases.

detaileddescription.para: Although confusing, the term "skill increase" for this is taken from OpenMW itself.

simplesect.para: The increase in the attribute caused by skills.

briefdescription.para: Get the bounty of the player.
Set the name of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new name of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the race of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new race of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the head mesh used by a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new head mesh of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the hairstyle mesh used by a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new hairstyle mesh of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set whether a player is male or not.
Set the birthsign of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new birthsign of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set whether the player's stats should be reset based on their current race as the result of a PlayerBaseInfo packet.

detaileddescription.para: This changes the resetState for that player in the server memory, but does not by itself send a packet.

briefdescription.para: Set the character level of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new level of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the player's progress to their next character level.

parameterdescription.para: The new level progress of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the base health of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new base health of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the current health of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new current health of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the base magicka of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new base magicka of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the current magicka of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new current magicka of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the base fatigue of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new base fatigue of the player.

briefdescription.para: Set the current fatigue of a player.

parameterdescription.para: The new current fatigue of the player.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short attributeId, int value) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetAttributeBase

briefdescription.para: Set the base value of a player's attribute.

parameterdescription.para: The new base value of the player's attribute.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short attributeId) noexcept
memberdef.name: ClearAttributeModifier

briefdescription.para: Clear the modifier value of a player's attribute.

detaileddescription.para: There's no way to set a modifier to a specific value because it can come from multiple different sources, but clearing it is a straightforward process that dispels associated effects on a client and, if necessary, unequips associated items.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short skillId, int value) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetSkillBase

briefdescription.para: Set the base value of a player's skill.

parameterdescription.para: The new base value of the player's skill.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short skillId) noexcept
memberdef.name: ClearSkillModifier

briefdescription.para: Clear the modifier value of a player's skill.

detaileddescription.para: There's no way to set a modifier to a specific value because it can come from multiple different sources, but clearing it is a straightforward process that dispels associated effects on a client and, if necessary, unequips associated items.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned short skillId, double value) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetSkillProgress

briefdescription.para: Set the progress the player has made towards increasing a certain skill by 1.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, unsigned int attributeId, int value) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetSkillIncrease

briefdescription.para: Set the bonus applied to a certain attribute at the next level up as a result of associated skill increases.

detaileddescription.para: Although confusing, the term "skill increase" for this is taken from OpenMW itself.

parameterdescription.para: The increase in the attribute caused by skills.

briefdescription.para: Set the bounty of a player.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned short pid, int currentStage, int endStage) noexcept
memberdef.name: SetCharGenStage

briefdescription.para: Set the current and ending stages of character generation for a player.

detaileddescription.para: This is used to repeat part of character generation or to only go through part of it.

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerBaseInfo packet with a player's name, race, head mesh, hairstyle mesh, birthsign and stat reset state.

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerStatsDynamic packet with a player's dynamic stats (health, magicka and fatigue).

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerAttribute packet with a player's attributes and bonuses to those attributes at the next level up (the latter being called "skill increases" as in OpenMW).

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerSkill packet with a player's skills.

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerLevel packet with a player's character level and progress towards the next level up.

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.

briefdescription.para: Send a PlayerBounty packet with a player's bounty.

detaileddescription.para: It is always sent to all players.
